summary: This document appears to be a page from grand jury material listing criminal counts and O.A. (possibly 'Other Acts') charges against Jeffrey Epstein and others. It details specific dates and charges related to conspiracy to entice minors and travel to engage in illicit sexual conduct.

keyFacts: The document lists multiple criminal counts (O.A. and Ct.) against Jeffrey Epstein and co-defendants Hyperion and Jege.
Charges span from 2004 to 2005 and include conspiracy to entice a minor, enticement of a minor, and travel to engage in illicit sexual conduct.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL GRAND JURY MATERIAL' and references 'JANE DOE #4'.
Specific dates of alleged criminal travel are detailed, showing a pattern of activity over approximately 14 months.
